overview:
Proven leader primarily focused in the Financial Services and Financing Brokerage industry.

Often referred to as an entrepreneurial visionary and strategist who drives success by building high-impact teams and developing results-oriented relationships with key partners and lending institutions.

Strong leadership skills enabling strong financial sales leaders to prosper while continually developing unique but effective processes and techniques toward financial entity operations.

Possess extensive financial and technical knowledge that is utilized continually on improving business competency.

Skilled at recruiting and managing top industry performers, financial management, corporate operations, and implementing ideas that drives profitability and loyalty.
